        Trigger filtering by text
        Parameters:
        str - any text to search in member
        Since:

      • setCompetenceSearch_usage

        public void setCompetenceSearch_usage​(java.lang.String usageStr)
        Trigger filtering by usage
        Parameters:
        usageStr - from "guest", "account" or "contact" (any other value will not apply any filtering)
        Since:
        esn-6.6

      • setCompetenceSearch_sort

        public void setCompetenceSearch_sort​(java.lang.String orderStr)
        Request sorting with specified order
        Parameters:
        orderStr - from "name", "cdate" or "relevance" (only if text is specified)
        Since:
        esn-6.6

      • getAvailableCompetenceSearch_sort

        public java.lang.String getAvailableCompetenceSearch_sort()
        Return the sort order that should be used given current context.
        Returns:
        orderStr from any value accepted by AllMemberQueryHandler, "name", "cdate" or "relevance" (relevance is used only if text is specified)
        Since:
        esn-6.6

      • setCompetenceSearch_reverse

        public void setCompetenceSearch_reverse​(boolean reverse)
        Request normal or reverse sorting with specified order
        Parameters:
        reverse - false for default sort order, true for reverse order
        Since:
        esn-6.6

      • getAvailableCompetenceSearch_reverse

        public boolean getAvailableCompetenceSearch_reverse()
        Retrieve the sort order that should be used.
        Returns:
        false for default sort order, true for reverse order
        Since:
        esn-6.6

        Parameters:

      • getAvailableCompetenceSearch_pagerAll

        public boolean getAvailableCompetenceSearch_pagerAll()
        Retrieve wether pagination is used (false), or all resulte are retrieved (if in the limit).
        Returns:
        true to retrieve all result, false to use pagination
        Since:
        esn-6.6
